[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_credentials_for_account_creation()] [Account Grinding] Can an attacker perform account grinding to generate accounts with addresses that bypass certain access control checks or pattern filters? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Struct: KeyGen] [Unsafe Code] Does the implementation contain any unsafe {} blocks that could lead to memory unsafety or undefined behavior when generating keys? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: from_seed()] [Integer Overflow] Can the 32-byte seed array indexing overflow, or are all array accesses bounds-checked by the compiler? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Struct: KeyGen] [Drop Implementation] Is there a custom Drop implementation that securely zeros sensitive data, or does the default Drop leave key material in memory? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_private_key()] [Panic Safety] Can panics during key generation leave the KeyGen instance in a corrupted state, causing future key generations to fail or produce weak keys? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: from_os_rng()] [Unwind Safety] If a panic occurs during seed generation from OsRng, is the partial seed data properly cleaned up, or does it leak? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_private_key()] [Key Exhaustion] Over the lifetime of the blockchain, can the finite Ed25519 keyspace become exhausted, or is collision probability negligible even with billions of accounts? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_bls12381_private_key()] [Coordinate Extraction] Can BLS private key scalar values be extracted from side-channel observations during subsequent signature operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_x25519_keypair()] [Montgomery Ladder] Does X25519 scalar multiplication use a constant-time Montgomery ladder, or can variable-time operations leak private key bits? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_credentials_for_account_creation()] [AuthKey Length] Is the authentication key vector always exactly 32 bytes, or can variable-length auth keys cause parsing errors in account validation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Struct: KeyGen] [RNG Reseeding] Does StdRng ever reseed itself during operation, and if so, can an attacker influence the reseed process to bias future key generation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: from_seed()] [Seed Derivation] If seeds are derived from passwords or passphrases, is proper key derivation (e.g., Argon2, PBKDF2) used, or are passwords directly used as seeds? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_keypair()] [Public Key Compression] Is the Ed25519 public key properly compressed to 32 bytes, or can decompression errors cause verification failures? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_bls12381_private_key()] [Scalar Reduction] Are BLS private key scalars properly reduced modulo the curve order, or can unreduced scalars cause signature operation failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_x25519_private_key()] [Point Validation] Are X25519 public keys validated to be on the curve, or can invalid curve points cause key exchange failures or attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_credentials_for_account_creation()] [Address Checksum] Do account addresses include checksums to prevent typos, or can one-bit errors send funds to wrong addresses? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_keypair()] [Quantum Vulnerability] Are Ed25519 keys vulnerable to Shor's algorithm on quantum computers, and is there a migration path to post-quantum cryptography? (Low - future concern)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_bls12381_private_key()] [Quantum Pairing Attacks] Can quantum computers break BLS signatures via pairing inversion, and does Aptos have a plan to transition to quantum-resistant consensus signatures? (Low - future concern)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_x25519_keypair()] [Quantum Key Exchange] Is the X25519 key exchange quantum-safe, or will future quantum adversaries be able to decrypt historical network traffic? (Low - future concern)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_bls12381_private_key()] [Slow Key Generation] Is BLS private key generation significantly slower than Ed25519, and can an attacker trigger excessive BLS key generation to DoS validator initialization? (Low - DoS out of scope)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_keypair()] [Batch Generation Optimization] Can multiple keypairs be generated in parallel without sharing RNG state, or does sequential generation create a bottleneck during bulk account creation? (Low - performance)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: from_os_rng()] [Blocking Behavior] Can OsRng block when entropy is low, causing validator initialization to hang and preventing nodes from joining consensus? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_keypair()] [Transaction Signing] Are keypairs generated by this module compatible with Move VM's transaction signature verification, or can format mismatches cause valid transactions to be rejected? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_credentials_for_account_creation()] [Move Account Model] Does the authentication key format align with Move's account model, or can discrepancies prevent account initialization or resource access? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-keygen/src/lib.rs] [Function: generate_ed25519_keypair()] [Multi-Agent Transactions] Can keypairs be used for multi-agent transaction signing, or are additional key types/formats required? (Medium)
